flavorText: Purphoros forged the manticore's tail from bronze, its teeth from silver, and its heart from hate.

foreignData.flavorText: Purphoros schmiedete den Schwanz des Mantikors aus Bronze, seine Zähne aus Silber und sein Herz aus Hass.
foreignData.name: Traumlauer-Mantikor
foreignData.text: Immer wenn du deinen ersten Zauberspruch im Zug eines Gegners wirkst, fügt der Traumlauer-Mantikor einem Ziel deiner Wahl 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

foreignData.flavorText: Purforos forjó del bronce la cola de la mantícora; de la plata, sus dientes; y del odio, su corazón.
foreignData.name: Mantícora acechasueños
foreignData.text: Siempre que lances tu primer hechizo durante el turno de cada oponente, la Mantícora acechasueños hace 1 punto de daño a cualquier objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText: Purphoros forgea la queue de la manticore avec du bronze, ses dents avec de l'argent et son cœur avec de la haine.
foreignData.name: Manticore pisteuse de rêve
foreignData.text: À chaque fois que vous lancez votre premier sort pendant le tour de chaque adversaire, la Manticore pisteuse de rêve inflige 1 blessure à n'importe quelle cible.

foreignData.flavorText: Purforos forgiò la coda della manticora dal bronzo, i denti dall'argento e il cuore dall'odio.
foreignData.name: Manticora Cacciasogni
foreignData.text: Ogniqualvolta lanci la tua prima magia durante il turno di ogni avversario, la Manticora Cacciasogni infligge 1 danno a un qualsiasi bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: パーフォロスは、マンティコアの尾を青銅で作り、歯を銀で作り、心を憎しみで作った。
foreignData.name: 夢忍びのマンティコア
foreignData.text: 対戦相手の各ターン内で初めてあなたが呪文を唱えるたび、クリーチャー１体かプレインズウォーカー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。夢忍びのマンティコアはそれに１点のダメージを与える。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー・エンチャント — マンティコア

foreignData.flavorText: 퍼포로스는 맨티코어의 꼬리는 황동으로, 이빨은 은으로, 그리고 심장은 증오로 주조했다.
foreignData.name: 꿈 추적자 만티코어
foreignData.text: 당신이 각 상대의 턴 동안 당신의 첫 번째 주문을 발동할 때마다, 원하는 목표를 정한다. 꿈 추적자 만티코어는 그 목표에게 피해 1점을 입힌다.

foreignData.flavorText: Púrforo forjou a cauda da mantícora com bronze, os dentes com prata e o coração com ódio.
foreignData.name: Mantícora Espreita-sono
foreignData.text: Toda vez que você conjura sua primeira mágica durante o turno de cada oponente, Mantícora Espreita-sono causa 1 ponto de dano a qualquer alvo.

foreignData.flavorText: Пирфор выковал хвост мантикоры из бронзы, зубы из серебра, а сердце — из ненависти.
foreignData.name: Мантикора, Охотница из Кошмаров
foreignData.text: Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете ваше первое заклинание во время хода каждого из оппонентов, Мантикора, Охотница из Кошмаров наносит 1 повреждение любой цели.

foreignData.flavorText: 普罗烽斯在铸造蝎狮时，以青铜作尾，白银当牙，仇恨为心。
foreignData.name: 伏梦蝎狮
foreignData.text: 每当你施放每个对手回合中你的第一个咒语时，伏梦蝎狮对任意一个目标造成1点伤害。

foreignData.flavorText: 普羅烽斯在鑄造蠍獅時，以青銅作尾，白銀當牙，仇恨為心。
foreignData.name: 伏夢蠍獅
foreignData.text: 每當你施放每個對手回合中你的第一個咒語時，伏夢蠍獅對任意一個目標造成1點傷害。

name: Dreamstalker Manticore
originalText: Whenever you cast your first spell during each opponent's turn, Dreamstalker Manticore deals 1 damage to any target.

rulings.text: An ability that triggers when you cast a spell resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger. It resolves even if that spell is countered.

This ability triggers only on your very first spell during an opponent’s turn, not the first spell after the card is on the battlefield. If you cast a spell before it’s on the battlefield (including if you cast this card somehow during an opponent’s turn), the ability won’t trigger.
If you have more than one opponent, this ability can trigger once during each of those opponents’ turns.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, this ability triggers no more than once during each opposing team’s turn.

text: Whenever you cast your first spell during each opponent's turn, Dreamstalker Manticore deals 1 damage to any target.
